Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Dealership and Purchase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses the storyline centered around the dinosaur dealership, featuring Dinny's trade-in, dinosaur shopping, a test ride, and the ultimate purchase of a dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Trade-in and Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the idea of trading in an old dinosaur and transitions to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership, setting the stage for dinosaur shopping.

narrative_arcs.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping

sub_scenes.title: Test Ride and Purchase of a Zippy Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a customer's test ride of a 'zippy' dinosaur, the unexpected pinching incident, and the subsequent purchase despite the mishap.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Pinch
Concluding the Dinosaur Deal After Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Trade and Resale
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the farewell to Dinny, his trade-in at the dealership, and his subsequent resale at a discounted price.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny on Sale at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Unmasking and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a new dinosaur sale attempt, a bumpy test ride, and the dramatic reveal that the problematic dinosaur is actually Dinny, leading to his return.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Unpleasant Test Ride

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Fishing Trip
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on romantic relationships and conflicts, particularly involving Alley and Coola, and a fishing trip that highlights male-female dynamics and interpersonal annoyances.

sub_scenes.title: Coola's Rejection and Breakup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley's invitation to Coola for fishing, her rejection, and the dramatic breakup signaled by a falling rock.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Musings and Fishing Trip Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents misogynistic viewpoints on women and shifts to specific annoyances experienced during a fishing trip, setting up interpersonal conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances: Baiting and Loud Talking
Confrontation and Apology on the Fishing Trip

sub_scenes.title: Gossip, Jealousy, and Misdirected Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves gossip about Coola, escalating jealousy, and a journey to verify rumors, culminating in a scene of misdirected romantic attention towards Cherie.

narrative_arcs.title: Gossip and Competition for Coola's Affections
Skepticism and the Challenge to Verify Coola's Loyalty

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Rage and Romantic Confusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays jealous confrontation, physical violence, misdirected aggression, and romantic realization, highlighting the complexities of love and jealousy.

narrative_arcs.title: Misdirected Aggression and a Name Revealed
Affectionate Comfort and a Confused Realization

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Advice and Misunderstood Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features romantic advice given by 'Wal' to 'Pozy', exploring different definitions of romance and introducing the bizarre 'French Fried Freak' technique.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gifts and Crocodile Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows romantic gestures with flowers and a log, humorously interrupted by a crocodile attack and social commentary on vulgarity.

narrative_arcs.title: Critique of Vulgarity and Subdued Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Outbursts and Misinterpreted Kisses
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes jealous rage, a romantic interlude observed with confusion, verbal aggression, and a violent misunderstanding over a hand kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusations and Romantic Change
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features public accusations of infidelity, violent retribution for perceived cheating, and Alley's decision to become more romantic, observed with male confusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Romantic Resolution and New Approach

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around the introduction and spread of the 'New Twist' dance, exploring its social pressure, learning attempts, and unexpected, humorous consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Twist Dance Injuries and Social Pressure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'New Twist' dance, highlighting injuries caused by it and the social pressure to participate, particularly on Alley.

narrative_arcs.title: Consequences of the New Twist Dance
Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Dance

sub_scenes.title: Learning the Twitch and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley's reluctant attempt to learn the 'twitch' dance, comedic mishaps during practice, and the surprising reveal of Alley's true identity as Miss Glump.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation and Hospitalization from the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows nighttime discussion about the twitch, public humiliation of Alley related to the dance, and the surprising consequence of widespread hospitalizations due to 'watching the twitch'.

narrative_arcs.title: Nighttime Twitch Discussion and Mysterious Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain for Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the use of a time machine for historical research in 16th century Spain, focusing on Alley and Ooola's journey and their initial, chaotic experiences in the past.

sub_scenes.title: Planning Time Travel for Research
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the research problem, the idea of using a time machine to gather firsthand information, and the preparation of the time machine for 'Oop'.

narrative_arcs.title: Researching 16th Century Spain and the Time Machine Idea
Preparing the Time Machine for Oop

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude and Time Transportation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a romantic moment between Alley and Ooola interrupted by their unexpected transportation to the 20th century via time machine.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley and Ooola
Arguing and Agreeing to a Kiss
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in 20th Century and Spanish Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley and Ooola's arrival in the 20th century, their conversation with Dr. Wonmug, and the reveal of their 'important assignment' in Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel
Postponed Kiss and Dispatch to Ancient Spain

sub_scenes.title: Chaos in Spain: Confrontation and Serenade
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley's arrival in Spain and his immediate chaotic encounters: a confrontation with an angry Spaniard and an intervention in a serenade gone wrong.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Confusion
The Serenade and the Annoyed Observer
Attack on the Serenader and Balcony Woman's Initial Reaction
Apology, Impending Consequences, and the Manager's Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Preparations and Performance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the urgent preparations for a bullfight, discussions about bullfighting technique, recruitment of a participant, and the actual bullfight performance with Alley as the bullfighter.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgency to Start the Bullfight and Crowd's Demand
Spectator Commentary on Bullfighter's Appearance and Weapon Choice
Doubt and Reassurance about the Bullfighter's Courage

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Return and Kiss Denial
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the aftermath of Oop's mission to Spain, his return to the 20th century, and the unexpected denial of a promised kiss from Jane.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop and Spanish Interlude
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Jane's decision to bring Oop back, a brief romantic interlude in Spain, and Oop's unexpected return in a captured state.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop for Information
Courting Scene with Spanish Lady and Gentleman
Oop's Abduction and Jane's Relief at His Return

sub_scenes.title: The Promised Kiss and Unexpected Denial
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene centers on Jane reminding Oop of a promised kiss, his initial positive reaction, and his shocking denial of the kiss, hinting at a significant revelation.

narrative_arcs.title: Jane Reminds Oop of Promised Kiss
Oop's Unexpected Denial of Kiss and Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Temporary Rule
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day', the initial experiences of temporary kingship, and the humorous downfall of a temporary ruler.

sub_scenes.title: The Burdens of Temporary Kingship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' and his initial orders, followed by the realization that being king is more tiring than it seems.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life

sub_scenes.title: Succession and Rejection of Temporary King
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the 'King's' planned absence, the appointment of a temporary replacement, and the crowd's immediate and violent rejection of the new temporary king.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement
Proclamation and Respect Demand for Temporary King
Reign of Rocks: The Temporary King's Downfall
Aftermath and the Original King's Return

Major_Arcs.title: Guz and Oompa's Domestic Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the domestic life of Guz and Oompa, highlighting their humorous conflict over misunderstandings and household chores.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Pills and Dirty Feet Dispute
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Guz's misunderstanding about ulcer pills, Oompa's anger over dirty feet on a clean floor, and the resulting chase and foot washing.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Tub Reflection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Guz in a tub, reflecting on his experience and understanding why the original Guz takes frequent vacations.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Tub Contemplation and Vacation Insight

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Justice and Clam Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a dispute over found clams, featuring royal intervention, investigation, and a wise elder's resolution to the conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Royal Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents initial conflicts including cheating accusations and a money fight, leading to a royal inquiry about a new disturbance - the clam dispute.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Cheating in a Game
The Mystery of the Missing Clams and Royal Inquiry

sub_scenes.title: Wise Elder's Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the crowned figure realizing the clams are his, involving a wise elder, and the elder's clever resolution by declaring the clams are gone.

narrative_arcs.title: Royal Deduction and Wise Elder Intervention in the Clam Dispute
Wise Elder's Resolution: 'Nothing Left to Fight About'

Major_Arcs.title: Life in Moonina Palace
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores aspects of royal life in Moonina Palace, including investigating disturbances, financial dealings of the advisor, and the crowned king's health concerns.

sub_scenes.title: Palace Disturbance and Advisor's Money Keeping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the investigation of a racket outside Moonina Palace, revealing a fight, and then shifts to the advisor's admission of keeping money.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Royal Health Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on dinner at Moonina Palace, highlighting the crowned king's enjoyment of rich food and the advisor's sudden concern for his ulcer.

sub_scenes.title: Unpleasant Dinner and Sudden Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a messy and unpleasant dinner, the king's regret about being king, and a sudden, violent attack on the king by the serving caveman.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies, Abdication, and Ruler Offer
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc includes scenes of reconciliation between Guz and Oompah, the abdication of the crowned king, and a surprising offer of rulership to a young caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Guz and Oompah's Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features apologies exchanged between Guz and Oompah, resolving their previous conflict and highlighting Oompah's aversion to Guz's job.

sub_scenes.title: King's Freedom and Ruler Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the former crowned king's relief at being an ordinary citizen again and introduces a new proposition: offering rulership to a young caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Measuring Interlude
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene is a brief, comedic interlude showing cavemen measuring with a board and featuring a character labeled 'Strange Duck'.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring with a Board and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act and Tonsorial Parlor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the 'Barberous Act', initially presented as a prophecy and then revealed as a forced shaving service, culminating in a busy tonsorial parlor.

sub_scenes.title: Prophecy of the Barberous Act
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the 'Barberous Act' through a prophecy by the Grand Wizer, foretelling a meeting with a bearded stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving and Tonsorial Service
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the 'Barberous Act' as forced shaving, shows the bearded man performing this act, and transitions to 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor', where it's a commercial service.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Centurion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative by revisiting the time machine, depicting its malfunction and the unexpected arrival of a Roman Centurion instead of Oop.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the inventor preparing the time machine to bring Oop to the present, but instead, a Roman Centurion materializes due to a malfunction.
